name: Jenkins
title: jenkins.io
shortDescription: Jenkins is a leading open source automation server that supports a wide range of software development processes with its extensive plugin ecosystem. It is designed for developers and teams to build, deploy, and automate projects at any scale. Example use case: Automating continuous integration and delivery pipelines for a multi-platform software project.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: CircleCI
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Strong in CI/CD with cloud support

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: GitLab CI
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Integrated with GitLab for full DevOps
